title: Best of The Herd: 10/03/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/03/2018
description:
Colin says people are over-thinking LeBron to the Lakers and its obviously going to be interesting, who cares if they don't win yet. He talks with Chargers QB Phillip Rivers about the offensive explosion in the NFL and whether he needs to win a title to validate his career. Plus, Aaron Rodgers is having issues with his coaching staff again and Colin says it’s because Aaron doesn't put the work in. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
